entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Chain.build() fails for custom certs in certain environments #75170
  • Remove Arcade HelixResultsDestinationDir workaround #75169
    8.0.0
  • PauseWriterThreshold and ResumeWriterThreshold options of PipeOptions not validated properly #75166
  • CI failure in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler tests #75164
  • Performance regressions from #74665 and #74777 #75157
    8.0.0
  • NetworkInterface.GetPhysicalAddress().GetAddressBytes() seems problematic with LLVM enabled on Android x86_64 #75155
  • Update metadata when entities are deleted by an EnC edit #75154
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Settle on MonoWasmBuildVariant to control build variants #75152
    8.0.0
  • superpmi: add collection of run of libraries tests #75150
    8.0.0
  • Consider increase to TwoDigitYearMax #75148
    Future
  • Code duplication between amd64 and arm64 intrinsics #75144
    8.0.0
  • S.T.J. Source Generation serialization to stream fails for record types #75139
    8.0.0
  • Add an analyzer warning of erroneous usage of MaxResponseHeadersLength #75137
    Future
  • Edge-case race condition in WebProxy #75134
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] The System.Xml.Tests.TCValidateAfterAddInvalidSchema.AddValid_Import_Include_Redefine test gets stuck on Browser with multi-threading enabled #75132
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] The System.Xml.Tests.XmlSystemPathResolverTests.TestResolveInvalidPath test test gets stuck on Browser with multi-threading enabled #75129
    8.0.0
  • NullabilityInfoContext reports `Unknown` instead of `NotNull` for `ClassRestrictedGeneric<>` #75126
  • [Mono] Behavior difference between optimized and non-optimized build #75125
  • [wasm-mt] The System.Xml.Tests.TC_SchemaSet_Add_URL.v4 test gets stuck on Browser with multi-threading enabled #75123
    8.0.0
  • SerialPort is not supported on Mac Catalyst #75120
  • Possible optimization opportunity of integer multiplication by constant #75119
    Future
  • QuicListener.AcceptConnectionAsync rethrowing exceptions #75115
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Ensure that suspending thread priority is not below normal. #75112
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Consider porting/sharing CastCache form CoreClr #75111
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Enable card bundles and software writewatch on Windows #75110
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Implement thin locks #75108
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Implement GCToEEInterface::EagerFinalized #75107
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Implement `MethodTable::HasCriticalFinalizer` #75106
    Future
  • Why does my .NET 6.0 application hit Thread Starvation easier than the .NET Framework ? #75104
    Future
  • Fails Reflection to System.Private.CoreLib at Generic method on IIS #75103
  • JIT doesn't eliminate dead loops #75100
    8.0.0

Closed

  • OrdinalIgnoreCase could be faster when one of the args is a const ASCII string #45613
    Future
  • PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials for PIN not Password #74992
  • Statically Linked NativeAOT HelloWorld throws Segmentation fault with Globalization Cultural Data #70848
    Future
  • Unexpected System.BadImageFormatException for an invocation of a static abstract method declared in a non-generic interface #74792
  • Build failure in Microsoft.Extensions.HostFactoryResolver.Tests: xunit.assert 2.4.2 - author primary signature's signing certificate is not trusted by the trust provider #75040
    Future
  • NullReferenceException inside ConcurrentDictionary.GrowTable #69192
    7.0.0
  • CI failure: Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) at System.SZArrayHelper.GetEnumerator #74178
    7.0.0
  • Add Marvin32 to System.IO.Hashing #68616
    8.0.0
  • Erroneous leading space in ShortTimePattern and LongTimePattern in Burmese Cultures ({my} and {my-MM}) #75087
  • variable is not as expected in System.Threading.Tasks #75117
  • ClientWebSocket options are potentially silently ignored in case an invoker is passed #74416
    7.0.0
  • Potential premature dispose of HTTP/2 connection in ClientWebSocket #74415
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Recognize 'bt' bit test idiom #72986
    Future
  • native build, have an issue in Swagger #75109
  • Importer's spilling logic is incomplete in subtle ways #72133
    8.0.0
  • Uri gives surprising result when given a relativeUri that looks absolute #74869
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!varTypeIsFloating(op2Type)' in 'ManagedTests.DynamicCSharp.Conformance.dynamic.dynamicType.conversions.target003.target003.TargetIsPredefinedValueType:NullableDoubleTypeWithNumericConversionFromFloatInAssignment():bool' during 'Generate code' #74172
    7.0.0
  • IConfiguration.GetValue<T>() is no longer defined in .NET 6 #75089
  • WebProxy method IsBypassed(uri) returns false although uri is in bypass list #58249
    7.0.0
  • [mono][workloads] Support building net-6.0 wasm workload apps in a net-7.0 sdk #65211
    7.0.0
  • System.Data.Odbc.OdbcException (0x80131937): ERROR [0] #74059
  • System.Data.OleDb.Test - timeout and hangs #74488
  • Various Runtime assert failures on both Windows and Linux #75091
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] Assertion failed '!"Bad type in gtNewZeroConNode" Morph - Global' #57918
    8.0.0
  • The IDataRecord interface does not have methods to get the value of an unsigned integer field. #75116
  • [NetSDKE2E]Installing .NET 7.0 RC2 SDK, .NET Runtime version is RC1 #75105

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0][wasm-mt] Fix pack/build issues in threaded builds #75171
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Target only net7.0 during source-build #75168
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update Linux/arm, Linux/arm64 cross containers to ones including pip3 #75167
  • Support multiple processor groups for NativeAOT #75165
    os-windows, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Revert "Unload MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources. (#74749)"" #75163
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm-mt] Fix pack/build issues in threaded builds #75162
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement TryExportEncryptedPkcs8PrivateKeyPem with byte passwords #75161
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement AuthenticationTagMismatchException exception #75160
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] add ability to set GCName via runtimeconfig. #75159
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Make RegisterChangeCallback consistent with CancellationChangeToken #75158
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/7.0] Update Roslyn compiler build #75156
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Rename `$(WasmSIMD)`, and `$(WasmExceptionHandling)` to `$(WasmEnable*)` #75153
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add test for serializing large objects #75147
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Update branding to 6.0.10 #75146
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #75145
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix issue with pip install on Alpine #75143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Sum intrinsic for amd64 #75142
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Disable the GetTotalPauseDuration test #75141
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid date string allocation in OpenSslX509CertificateReader.ExtractValidityDateTime #75138
    area-System.Security
  • Use IndexOf{Any} in a few more places in System.Reflection.Metadata #75135
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [wasm] Limit Vector128.Shuffle intrinsics #75133
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Use Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes instead of open-coded loop in CreateSecKeyAndSecWebSocketAccept #75130
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm-mt] Fix failing System.Xml tests on Browser with multi-threading enabled #75124
    area-System.Xml
  • [LoongArch64] amend the crossgen2 for LA64. #75118
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set names to runtime internal threads #75113
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] CodeGen verification testing #75102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix race condition in DacEnumerableHashTable::BaseFindNextEntryByHash #75099
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update docs for renamed type parameters #75032
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Add a few missing char.IsXx helpers usage to RegexGenerator.Emitter.cs #75101
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Use the correct runtime pack version when the workload is not installed #75028
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Avoid temporary byte[] allocation in Pkcs' HeapBlockRetainer.AllocAsciiString #75136
    area-System.Security
  • Disable MaxResponseHeadersLength_Http3 test #75149
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [Perf][Maui] Quick fix for current Maui net6.0 runs. #75027
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • use msquic bits on all Windows platforms #74544
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/7.0] Disable KerberosExecutor on LinuxBionic, it doesn't have GSSAPI libraries #75047
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [release/7.0] Remove duplicate SourceGeneration generator refs #75128
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Fix W^X flag for setting `ITypeInfo` #75046
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Add support so that SDK6 will continue to get the latest ILC packages #75030
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Do not retype small locals in `FIELD_LIST`s on x86 #75036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve morphing of bit comparisons to constant 0/1 #73120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • add ability to set GCName via runtimeconfig. #74831
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Consolidate importer spilling code V3 #73233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Make the JsonSerializerOptions.MemberAccessorStrategy property static. #74986
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Update Roslyn compiler build #75058
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fix argument validation in RuntimeType.InvokeMember #75006
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono][jit] Zero extend the return when we might be invoking llvm generated code #74991
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Enable HTTP & SSL stress runs on release/7.0 #75082
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • improve handling of TLS certificates on Linux #74695
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption via "generated-like" interop #74669
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm] fix prefetch in samples #75092
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] move the legacy interop tests to new location #75122
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix Mono Windows x86 build and runtime crash. #74639
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, runtime-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] CI: Trigger wasm jobs on some specific libraries #75007
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Throw on incompatible WebSocket options #75014
    area-System.Net, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • Enable DOTNET_JitStdOutFile in Release #75085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disable TYP_BLK stressing for tail call to loop optimization #74999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Don't try to build PGO tools on platforms with no CoreCLR port. #75003
    area-Infrastructure-mono, arch-s390x

Updated

  • Enable SuperPMI collection of CoreCLR test run #74961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder: Fix complex types in constructors #74981
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Avoid gate/worker thread creation failure stall the thread pool #74791
    area-System.Threading
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix Vector documentation #74701
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74762
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • ARM64 - Allow double constants to CSE more often #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix `Exp10M1(TSelf)` and `Round(TSelf, MidpointRounding)` #75063
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Initialization failures logging #75097
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm] SIMD related build fixes #75042
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Simplify installer build by using step container targets #75011
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Reuse more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration code in JS generators #74949
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator
  • Replace assert with BADCODE #75068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize the performance of InternalConfigurationRootExtensions.GetChildrenImplementation #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Tar: Fix buffer is too small error when writing Prefix on large filenames #75023
    area-System.IO
  • [SocketException]: New Constructor with string? for SocketException #74744
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • AcceptAsync with existing Socket support on Unix, Review Changes #74645
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/7.0] [Android][libs] Introduce DateTimeOffset.Now temporary fast result #74965
    7.0.0
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [IGNORE][wasm] add simd testing on ci #75064
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Delete `(unsigned)CHECK_SPILL_ALL|NONE` casts #72889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix spilling of `MUL_LONG` on x86 and multi-reg HWIs #73079
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Negate and OnesComplement intrinsics for amd64 #74993
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • use Task.Run to execute SmtpClient #74910
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Fix converting old SIMD ctors to HWI ones #71865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix unrecognized unaligned field indirections on ARM32 #75078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Swallow ObjectDisposedException when aborting QuicStream from CancellationAction #74634
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Use analyzers from targeting pack for NetCoreAppCurrent #75093
    area-Infrastructure
  • Clean `impReturnInstruction` up a bit #72887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Double (and Float) to Decimal Conversion Precision Improvement #72217
    area-System.Numerics, 8.0.0
  • JIT: local assertion prop and redundant zeroing #74967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Change LibrariesConfiguration defaults in tests #75033
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Encode UserName value in UriBuilder (Issue #74662) #74953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fixing PhysicalFilesWatcher path maintenance (Issue #71386) #72041
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix RegexOptions.NonBacktracking matching end anchors at timeout check boundaries #74525
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Free getline buffer after use #74899
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add intrinsic for IndexOfAny on Arm64 #74010
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 intrinsics for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux #67589
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Change OnRemovePerEntryCleanupAction to delete[] its underlying bytes #73790
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
